--runner=DataflowRunner
--region=us-central1
--temp_location=gs://temp-storage-for-perf-tests/loadtests
--staging_location=gs://temp-storage-for-perf-tests/loadtests
--input=gs://apache-beam-ml/testing/inputs/sentences_50k.txt
--model_name=google/gemma-2b-it
--machine_type=n1-standard-8
--disk_size_gb=100
--input_options={}
--num_workers=4
--max_num_workers=25
--autoscaling_algorithm=THROUGHPUT_BASED
--publish_to_big_query=true
--output_table=apache-beam-testing.beam_run_inference.result_gemma_vllm_batch
--metrics_dataset=beam_run_inference
--metrics_table=gemma_vllm_batch
--influx_measurement=gemma_vllm_batch
--model_gcs_path=gs://apache-beam-ml/models/gemma-2b-it
--worker_harness_container_image=us.gcr.io/apache-beam-testing/beam-vllm-gpu-base:v0.2.0_NVIDIA
--sdk_harness_container_image=us.gcr.io/apache-beam-testing/beam-vllm-gpu-base:v0.2.0_NVIDIA
--sdk_container_image=us.gcr.io/apache-beam-testing/beam-vllm-gpu-base:v0.2.0_NVIDIA
--sdk_location=container
--dataflow-service-options=worker_accelerator=type:nvidia-tesla-t4,count:1,install_nvidia_driver
--experiments=use_runner_v2,enable_custom_shm_size_4096
